 "Shinsengumi," the buke-denso-- Nomiya

 confined from meeting with anyone
on that day, since they were in the list=
 of 20 nobles in Sanjo
Chunagon Sanetomi's group who were similarly confine=

re to

cord and believe they were the ones who bestowed the name, they

had to bestowed it prior to the 8/18 incident. Therefore it

e that Katamori or one of the men close to him bestowed
